title: Crystal Assassin armor
summaries: Crystal Assassin armor is an armor set which consists of the Crystal Assassin Hood, Crystal Assassin Shirt, and the Crystal Assassin Pants. The armor set grants non-class-specific bonuses. It is obtained from Queen Slime; she always drops one piece / two pieces upon defeat.
A full set of Crystal Assassin armor provides the following benefits:

• +36 defense
  • +15% damage
  • +15% critical strike chance
  • +20% movement speed
  • -10% mana cost
  • +10% ammo conservation
  • +10% melee speed
  • Ability to dash
